programme.title: Write Before Christmas
programme.desc: Jessica sends Christmas cards to five people who have greatly impacted her life.

programme.desc: Blanche fears she may be pregnant, but is actually going through menopause.

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: Rose must look for work after she loses her grief-counseling job.

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: The roommates welcome Rose's recently blinded sister, whose independent manner is deceptive.

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: Blanche panics when her father reveals his outlandish plans for the future.

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: Dorothy, Rose and Blanche reminisce about how they all came to live together.

programme.title: Reba
programme.desc: Cheyenne and Van must run interference at a client party after Reba takes a pill, by mistake, that will make her violently ill if she drinks alcohol.

programme.title: Reba
programme.desc: When Barbra Jean signs Reba up for an online dating service, Reba winds up dating a mystery man and spending less time with the family.

programme.title: Reba
programme.desc: When Reba teams up with Van to invest in real estate, he buys an uninspected house, which prompts her to want out of their partnership.

programme.title: Reba
programme.desc: Cheyenne asks Reba to talk some sense into Van when he stops going to church, but when Reba's efforts fail, she takes her problem straight to the church's handsome new minister (Patrick Fabian).

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: Daphne finds an engagement ring in Martin's drawer, prompting Niles to research Sherry's (Marsha Mason) past.

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: Frasier's agent hopes to enhance his client's image by getting zoo officials to name a crane after him.

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: Niles and Maris go to a marriage counselor; Frasier helps Niles run a workshop for couples.

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: Proximity provokes passions as Frasier, Niles and Martin join Daphne and her friend at a holiday ski resort.

programme.title: Cheers
programme.desc: Rebecca coaches Norm for a job interview as a taster at a brewery; a slot machine is accidentally delivered to the bar.

programme.title: Cheers
programme.desc: Sam defends his ladies man status in a contest with a suave Frenchman (Anthony Cistaro).

programme.title: Reba
programme.desc: Reba is disappointed when her plans for Halloween fall through because everyone in the family has other plans.

programme.title: Reba
programme.desc: Realizing that his wife has gained quite a bit of weight, Brock consults Reba on how best to handle the delicate situation.

programme.title: Reba
programme.desc: The family learns that Cheyenne no longer wishes to pursue a career in dentistry after she turns down Brock's offer to intern at his office; Barbara Jean is called for jury duty.

programme.title: Reba
programme.desc: A miscommunication with her brother, Bryan, sends Barbra Jean to his place for Thanksgiving, while he goes to Reba's.

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: The girls move into a Miami Beach hotel; they dress up to attend Burt Reynolds' movie premiere, only to be caught in a hotel raid, mistaken for prostitutes and dragged off to jail.

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: Dorothy begs Blanche to go out with her ex-husband, Stan, but becomes jealous when the couple hits it off; Sophia and Rose begin selling sandwiches on the Boardwalk but inadvertently make an enemy of another vendor.

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: A neighbor dies shortly after having a heated argument with Rose.

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: Rose befriends Dorothy's former college buddy (Lois Nettleton), not knowing that the woman is a lesbian.

programme.title: Check Inn to Christmas
programme.desc: Julia Crawley and Ryan Mason must unite their families during Crestridge's Centennial Christmas celebration to save their family inns from a chain resort.

programme.title: Deck the Walls
programme.desc: Interior designer, Rose DeMonte, uses her skills back in her hometown to renovate a Christmas Charity Home for her brother Sal and his contractor Brysen's home flipping company.

programme.title: A Magical Christmas Village
programme.desc: A woman tells her young granddaughter, Chloe, that her miniature Christmas village can magically grant holiday wishes. As Chloe begins setting up the figurines, real-life events seem to mimic the scenes she creates.

programme.title: The Royal Nanny
programme.desc: Working under cover as a nanny, an MI5 agent must resist the charms of Prince Colin while keeping the royal family safe during Christmastime.

programme.title: Unwrapping Christmas: Olivia's Reunion
programme.desc: Desperate to make it back home in time for the Christmas Gala, Olivia gets snowed-in with her ex-boyfriend while delivering gifts.

programme.title: Murder, She Baked
programme.desc: Hannah Swensen has her hands full with two romantic suitors, her baking business, a murdered customer, and the case to find her customer's killer.

programme.desc: Blanche has trouble dealing with her father's plan to marry a much younger woman.
